skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Sir Amalric is a bane to the unholy, capable of destroying hordes of undead enemies without even lifting his weapon.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against forces of Chaos, Undead and Greenskins
Melee defence: +4 when fighting against forces of Chaos, Undead and Greenskins
Leadership: +10 when fighting against forces of Chaos, Undead and Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against forces of Chaos, Undead and Greenskins
Melee defence: +8 when fighting against forces of Chaos, Undead and Greenskins
Attribute: Unbreakable when fighting against forces of Chaos, Undead and Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Spurred on by visions and faith, the knight has chosen to commit himself to the path of the Lady.
The Blessing of the Lady as his guide and companion, Sir Amalric's quest has been a successful one.
Far more than allegiance or loyalty, true dedication to Lady and kingdom further empowers her Knights on the field.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: +5% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: +10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

items.colour_text: This holy relic protects Sir Amalric from the gravest of harm, shielding him from the blows of his enemies.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Icon of the Lady"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: He is anathema to the unholy, capable of destroying hordes of undead enemies without even lifting his weapon.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Bane of the Undead"
